TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {19144=Rise To Glory (IRE) 7-2 (9-4) Led until over 1f out, weakened final furlong, 5th of 7, 2l behind Monsieur Royale (9-1) at Wolverhampton 6f hcp 0-70 (5) pol in Nov., 18951=Polar Kite (IRE) 12-1 (9-6) Dwelt in rear, never on terms, 6th of 10, 7l behind Four Winds (8-12) at Lingfield 7f clm stks (6) pol in Nov., 18462=Apostle (IRE) 6-1 (9-5) With leader, ridden over 2f out, lost 2nd over 1f out, no extra towards finish, 7th of 11, 2 3/4l behind Upavon (9-3) at Kempton 7f hcp 0-90 (3) pol in Nov., 17019=A couple of these are dropped in class with NAABEGHA preferred to Apostle. The former need only repeat his fourth to Horsted Keynes over track and trip in October to come out best. Apostle scored over today's distance at Kempton in the same month and has every chance on that form, though Mr David could only manage fourth when sent off joint-favourite in a claimer at the same track last time. Polar Kite looks best of the remainder on today's terms but he's struggling for form at present., 18240=Naabegha 8-1 (9-0) Held up, ridden 2f out, ran on final furlong, not reach leaders, 3rd of 12, 1l behind Addictive Dream (9-6) at Lingfield 6f hcp 0-95 (3) pol in Nov.}
